entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:06 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -25.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
